name: nicegui.ui.icon
description: Use for adding visual cues or decorative elements using standard icon sets.

quasar_props.name: Icon name from Material Icons or other icon libraries
quasar_props.size: Icon size (xs|sm|md|lg|xl) or CSS size with units
quasar_props.left: Align to the left, when used in a QBtn
quasar_props.right: Align to the right, when used in a QBtn

name.description: Name of the icon (snake case, e.g. add_circle)

size.description: Size in CSS units or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

color.description: Icon color (Quasar, Tailwind, or CSS color)

styling.description: Can be styled using Tailwind CSS classes or custom CSS
